title: WATCH: Michigan State's Cassius Winston, Miles Bridges connect on crazy alley-oop - CBSSports.com
text:

Michigan Stateâ€™s hopes of getting to the NCAA Tournament arenâ€™t yet solidified. Our own Jerry Palm has the Spartans as a No. 10 seed , so itâ€™s safe to say they are flirting with the bubble. 
Itâ€™s also safe to say that they are fully aware of that fact, and are playing accordingly. 
Just before the half Thursday night against Nebraska , with Michigan State dominating, Cassius Winston lead the charge in the open court and laid up a perfect assist off the backboard, with fellow freshman Miles Bridges finishing the play. Check this: Just when you think you've seen it all from @MilesBridges01 , @cassiuswinston goes and lobs it off the glass. ðŸ˜³ https://t.co/fRLdptF2Wf â€” Big Ten Network (@BigTenNetwork) February 24, 2017 
The Spartans are taking care of business. They took a 49-31 lead into the break -- check the GameTracker -- and appear to be well on the way to a bounce-back win in impressive fashion. Add a comment
